name: Morgan's Mini Mecha
description:
A short turn-based strategy game with tiny mech warriors. For one or two players. Includes online multiplayer, dual-controller, and pass & play modes.

The goal is to capture the opponent's Captain without being caught in its flamethrower attack. 

Fly stealth Bombers, drive chicken-legged Stalkers, unleash a missile barrage from a Reaper,  ram enemy units with the Grinder, and shock with the tiny Probe. Captured enemy units can be dropped into battle from twin choppers anywhere on the map. Most units can upgrade to a super version when they reach the opposite edge.
